directions: In a large saucepan, melt the butter/margarine. Add the soup, water and milk. Stir together over medium heat. Add the onion, salt and pepper and bring all to a boil.

When mixture starts boiling, add the chicken meat and simmer all together until chicken is cooked through. Add the sliced mushrooms and boil over medium heat for about 5 minutes, stirring often. Serve!
ingredients: 1 (10.75 ounce) can condensed cream of mushroom soup
2 pounds skinless, boneless chicken breast halves - cubed
title: Cream of Mushroom Chicken
